title: Add venomgladiator25 to admin username whitelist

requirements.text: Add the username 'venomgladiator25' to the admin username whitelist in the backend, enabling full admin panel access for this user when they click the admin button on the storefront
acceptanceCriteria: The username 'venomgladiator25' is added to the adminUsernameWhitelist map in the backend
When a user with username 'venomgladiator25' clicks the admin button on the storefront, the isAdminUsername query returns true
The user 'venomgladiator25' can successfully navigate to and access the admin panel

constraints: Maintain the existing adminUsernameWhitelist data structure in backend/main.mo
Do not modify the existing isAdminUsername query endpoint logic
Preserve all existing admin whitelist entries if any
nonGoals: Creating a UI for managing the admin whitelist
Implementing role-based permissions beyond the existing whitelist system
